title: Highly emissive blue graphene quantum dots with excitation-independent emission via ultrafast liquid-phase photoreduction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11524-11532
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01113A, Paper

Jae-Won Lee, Ji Hye Kwak, Juhee Kim, Yoon-Kwan Jang, Joong Tark Han, Tae-Jin Kim, Kyong-Soo Hong, Hee Jin Jeong, Imjeong H.-S. Yang
Graphene oxide quantum dots (GOQDs) are promising candidates for biomedical applications since they have lower toxicity and higher biocompatibility than traditional semiconductor quantum dots.
